title: Overcoming the Fear of the Multiplication Table
excerpt: Does the multiplication table seem intimidating? Breaking the task into small parts will make the challenge achievable.
author: Smart Worksheets Team
content:
It Only Looks Like a Lot

The multiplication table is actually far fewer than 100 exercises when you consider the commutative property. 7 times 8 is exactly the same as 8 times 7.

Start with the Easy Ones

Multiples of 1, 2, 5, and 10 are easy. Once you know them, half the table is already in your pocket.
